content.prompt: The use of images in the late 1800s and early 1900s such as the one shown had most in common with which of the following?

choices.label: Novels that promoted the idea that young people could achieve success through honesty and hard work
The concept, proposed by leading industrialists, that wealthy people had a moral responsibility to people living in poverty
The reporting of journalists that raised public awareness of social injustices in United States cities
The promotion of Christianity as a means to build good character and virtue

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
